title: Preparations for the Temple
summary: David begins preparations for Solomon to build the temple by gathering materials and organizing labor. He charges Solomon to obey God and build the temple with wisdom and courage.

faq.question: Why didnâ€™t David build the temple?
faq.answer: Because he was a warrior and had shed much blood.

faq.question: What did David provide for Solomon?
faq.answer: Gold, silver, iron, stone, wood, and skilled workers for the temple.
